description:
All the basic nodes to start MIDI processing with Arduino
Nodes to initialize MIDI IN and MIDI OUT on a Arduino.
It can read MIDI inputs, handle and send :
Note ON,
Note OFF,
Control Change (CC),
Program Change,
Aftertouch Channel,
PitchBend
name: midi-basic

HJGd9lB4V.content: DO NOT CONNECT ANYTHING TO TRG OF read-midi-msg

ry8Y6utV4.content:
Init default hardware serial port of the Arduino.
Leonardo, Due and other USB boards use Serial1 by default : Connect wires to Rx1 and Tx1
UNO uses Serial by default : Connect wires to Rx0 and Tx0

r1AhOlHV4.content: Initialize channel 10 and send notes to channel 10

@/handle-aftertouch-channel-pressure.description: Analyze if the MIDI msg is a channel aftertouch msg and send output channel aftertouch data

ByYKhvE44.description: Triggered when channel pressure aftertouch is sent
ByYKhvE44.label: Sent

HkH7ciPNV4.description: Trigger the node when a message is received for analyse
HkH7ciPNV4.label: TRG

@/handle-control-change.description: Analyze if the MIDI msg is a CC msg and send output CC data

Bk-G5hqkEE.description: First part of the midi msg
Bk-G5hqkEE.label: Data1

H1LsYde4ME.description: Triggered when a CC is detected
H1LsYde4ME.label: CC

HJeMq3cJNV.description: Trigger the MIDI CC message analyzer when a MIDI message is received
HJeMq3cJNV.label: TRG

SyGq39yEE.description: Second part of the MIDI msg
SyGq39yEE.label: Data2

@/handle-note-on-off.description: Analyze if the MIDI msg is a Note msg and send output Note data

BJW2CJNGN.description: Triggered when a NoteOff is detected
BJW2CJNGN.label: NoteOff

H1bLm0yEfE.description: Triggered when a NoteON is detected
H1bLm0yEfE.label: NoteOn

Hy3ORyNMN.description: Second part of the MIDI msg
Hy3ORyNMN.label: Data2

S1L701NzN.description: Trigger the midi message analyzer when a message in received
S1L701NzN.label: TRG

rkHdRJEfE.description: First part of the MIDI msg
rkHdRJEfE.label: Data1

@/handle-program-change.description: Analyze if the MIDI msg is a Program Change  msg and send output Program Change data

BkN-j-xHVN.description: Trigger the MIDI CC message analyzer when a MIDI message is received
BkN-j-xHVN.label: TRG

BkbsWxBNV.description: First part of the midi msg
BkbsWxBNV.label: Data1

HJm-i-xBNE.description: Triggered when a Progran Change is detected
HJm-i-xBNE.label: PC

@/init-midi-default.description:
Init the midi Hardware configuration on the default UART of the Arduino. For example :
Serial1 for Arduino DUE & Leonardo and
Serial for Arduino UNO

ry__YgHNE.description: Triggered when the MIDI initialization is done
ry__YgHNE.label: Done

rJHRcgr4N.content: DO NOT CONNECT ANYTHING TO TRG

H1NMNvwJ4E.description: First part of the midi msg data
H1NMNvwJ4E.label: Data1

SJzfVvwJ4N.description: Second part of the midi msg data
SJzfVvwJ4N.label: Data2

Sy7f4PwJNN.description:
Trigger the midi read continuously to catch all the input data.
DO NOT CONNECT
Sy7f4PwJNN.label: TRG

rybGVwwkEE.description: Triggered when valid midi msg is detected
rybGVwwkEE.label: MsgSent

@/send-control-change.description: Send CC msg to MIDI output

Hkf2mg3mEE.description: Trigger the sending of the CC msg to MIDI output
Hkf2mg3mEE.label: TRG

SkZ3Xx3Q4E.description: Triggered when the CC msg has been sent
SkZ3Xx3Q4E.label: Sent

@/send-note-off.description: Send a Note Off msg to MIDI output

BkfIjj9mNN.description: Trigger the sending of the Note Off msg
BkfIjj9mNN.label: TRG

SkZUosqXN4.description: Triggered when the Note Off msg has been sent
SkZUosqXN4.label: Sent

@/send-note-on.description: Send a Note On msg to MIDI output

By7sXl5XNV.description: Triggered when the NoteON has been sent
By7sXl5XNV.label: Sent

r1SjQx9QNE.description: Trigger the play of the note
r1SjQx9QNE.label: TRG

@/send-pitchbend.description: Send Pitchbend to MIDI output when it's played

Bk8J2D37EV.description: Second part of the MIDI msg
Bk8J2D37EV.label: Data2

HJknv2mVE.label: Data1
